Text: FW Harry AroraOriginal Message From Becky McGraw ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBeckyMcGrawCbeckycqgEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday February AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject Harry Arora Hi Danielle Harry is ready to go User name Harry Arora Password The old system will stay on for a week to allow you to grab his pages Thanks Becky

Reuters Kobra ChangesPST Market Data has recently made changes to the Reuters Kobra permissioning database If you no longer have access to information that you previously utilized on your Kobra application please contact Julie Pechersky at and the data will be restored immediately We appreciate your assistance Market Data

Freese Notis Cc We are currently being billed for Freese Notis Weather I will need to allocate these charges to the appropriate cost center If you would like to continue this service I could allocate it directly to your cost center or send you the bill directly If you know of anyone else who uses this application please let me know and I will split the cost among the departments Thank you Danielle Marcinkowski

FW PIRA and EnronPST All Here are the agreements that Enron had with PIRA Attached is a copy of the cost for the services Please review and let me know which subscriptions and how many you will be need We will have one agreement that combines Houston Calgary and Portland If you have any data questions our PIRA sales contact is Jeff Steele at Thanks Danielle x Original Message From Jeff Steele mailto Sent Tuesday January AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject PIRA and Enron Danielle PIRA had two agreements in place with Enron The first was with Enron Global Markets which received the following PIRA Services North American Natural Gas Retainer Service North American Electricity Retainer Service Global Oil Retainer Service European Natural Gas Retainer Service Emissions Market Intelligence Services EMIS NOX SOCO coverage Natural Gas Liquids NGL Forecast covering USEurope Daily Electricity Demand Forecast Western Canada Crude Price Forecast and PADD II Balances report PIRA served the following four offices Smith Street Houston TX SW Salmon Street Portland OR rd Ave SW Calgary Alberta TP H Canada Grosvenor Place London United Kingdom The Users at Enron Global Markets were divided up as follows Users Oil Natural Gas and Electricity Retainers Houston London Calgary Portland European Natural Gas Service London only Natural Gas Liquids Market Forecast Houston only Emissions Market Intelligence Services Houston only Daily Electricity Demand Forecast Houston and Portland only W Canadian Crude Price Forecast and PADD II Balances Report London and Houston only The second account we had with Enron was with Enron Energy Services Under this contract we provided the Oil Natural Gas and Electricity Retainer Services to Users located at Smith Street Houston TX I hope this helps Please contact me if you have any questions Regards Jeff Steele Manager Business Development PIRA Energy Group ext

IHS energyPST Chris Richey Please look over the IHS data services price list and let me know what service you will need They have put us in a Peer Group so the prices are less then they were previously Thank you Danielle x Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday January AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject PG BOE Map Danielle Heres the map requested Please call me with any question you may have Thank you Nelson Armstrong IHS Energy Group Account Manager Forwarded by Nelson ArmstrongHOUUSIHSE on AM Shan Giesler To Nelson HSE cc AM Subject PG BOE Map See attached file pg mapppt Shan Giesler Contract Administrator IHS Energy Group Westheimer Suite Houston TX

FW PIRA Energy Group and EnronPST All I said I would keep you in the loop on cost with these publications Please review the PIRA cost structure and let me know if you will be interested and the amount of users for this publication Note price increases for each site Thanks Danielle Original Message From Jeff Steele mailto Sent Wednesday January PM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject PIRA Energy Group and Enron Dear Danielle It was a pleasure talking with you today PIRA would be delighted to restart the relationship it has had with Enron over the course of the last decade As a first step I have attached an excel file presenting PIRAs site license pricing matrix which provides the fees for PIRAs Retainer Services oil gas electricity based on different levels of usage I have also attached a document listing all of our energy service offerings and studies along with the corresponding fees for you to review Please contact me if you have any questions I look forward to talking with you further Regards Jeff Steele Manager Business Development PIRA Energy Group ext

Market Data real time data subscriptions and PublicationsPST Cooper Here is a list of all services Market Data will support moving forward Please prioritize the list and add any systems that have been missed Thank you Danielle Marcinkowski

RE KobraPST sure I will take care of it Original Message From Sturm Fletcher J Sent Wednesday February AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject Kobra Danielle Could you please tell whoever was coming to give me the Kobra lesson at that I need to move it to Thanks Fletch

RE PIRAPST Does work for you What location Danielle Original Message From Sturm Fletcher J Sent Friday February AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject PIRA Danielle Id like to meet with you sometime today I have a meeting from to discuss what were services were talking to PIRA about for both gas and power Please let me know what time you can meet Thanks Fletch

Kobra todayPST Fletch Does today work for you to have a Reuters trainer come meet with you to get you up to speed on the Kobra application I apologize for not doing this sooner I just didnt catch that you had the Bridge application Thanks Danielle

Bridge Application Cc PST Fletch The BridgeTelerate system will not be migrated to the UBS infrastructure I noticed you had an account but wasnt sure if you actually use the application Let me know and I will have a Kobra Reuters trainer help setup anything you are not able to pull up into the Kobra app thanks Danielle

RE KobraPST Julie Pechersky is walking him over you can let them know when they get there Do you want me to take you out of Kobra all together so you do not get charged for the application thank d Original Message From Sturm Fletcher J Sent Wednesday February PM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject RE Kobra If its not too late I dont even need a lesson at allIm using my discount broker live feeds thanks fletch Original Message From Marcinkowski Danielle Sent Wednesday February AM To Sturm Fletcher J Subject RE Kobra sure I will take care of it Original Message From Sturm Fletcher J Sent Wednesday February AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject Kobra Danielle Could you please tell whoever was coming to give me the Kobra lesson at that I need to move it to Thanks Fletch

FW PIRA and EnronPST All Here are the agreements that Enron had with PIRA Attached is a copy of the cost for the services Please review and let me know which subscriptions and how many you will be need We will have one agreement that combines Houston Calgary and Portland If you have any data questions our PIRA sales contact is Jeff Steele at Thanks Danielle x Original Message From Jeff Steele mailto Sent Tuesday January AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject PIRA and Enron Danielle PIRA had two agreements in place with Enron The first was with Enron Global Markets which received the following PIRA Services North American Natural Gas Retainer Service North American Electricity Retainer Service Global Oil Retainer Service European Natural Gas Retainer Service Emissions Market Intelligence Services EMIS NOX SOCO coverage Natural Gas Liquids NGL Forecast covering USEurope Daily Electricity Demand Forecast Western Canada Crude Price Forecast and PADD II Balances report PIRA served the following four offices Smith Street Houston TX SW Salmon Street Portland OR rd Ave SW Calgary Alberta TP H Canada Grosvenor Place London United Kingdom The Users at Enron Global Markets were divided up as follows Users Oil Natural Gas and Electricity Retainers Houston London Calgary Portland European Natural Gas Service London only Natural Gas Liquids Market Forecast Houston only Emissions Market Intelligence Services Houston only Daily Electricity Demand Forecast Houston and Portland only W Canadian Crude Price Forecast and PADD II Balances Report London and Houston only The second account we had with Enron was with Enron Energy Services Under this contract we provided the Oil Natural Gas and Electricity Retainer Services to Users located at Smith Street Houston TX I hope this helps Please contact me if you have any questions Regards Jeff Steele Manager Business Development PIRA Energy Group ext

RE PIRA Cc PST Hello Fletch We did have issues at Enron regarding the redistribution of data without the proper licenses but since these contracts will fall under the UBS agreement we should not have problems moving forward I am currently working with the UBS contracts group to create new contracts for all Market Data applications and publications I will attach a list of contracts I am working on to make sure we are not duplicating efforts We are trying to centralize all contracts in order to leverage cost I have been meeting with Chris Gaskill Lloyd Will Rika Imai Cooper Richey and John Zufferli to verify that we are not missing any contracts I am discussing cost with all included for any publication prior to sending the contract to UBS If you are interested I will keep you in the loop with the contracts I have been talking with Jeff Steel from PIRA If you let me know what subscriptions and how many you will need from PIRA I will take care of submitting the contract to UBS Thanks Danielle x Original Message From Sturm Fletcher J Sent Tuesday January AM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject PIRA Danielle My name is Fletch Sturm and I run the MidwestSouthest power desk reporting to Kevin Presto at the new UBS Warburg Energy Kevin has asked me to be the contact to PIRA for all of power and gas Im in the process of gathering information on their services as well as internal requests for specific reports etc Chris Gaskill has informed me that there may be legal issues regarding Enron history with PIRA and that all negotiations over servicesfees need to go through the market data group Is this an old Enron problem and not a UBS issue Please inform Thanks Fletch
